name: io.github.CDataSoftware/connectcloud-mcp-server
description: MCP Server for CData Connect AI - Query, manage, and act on data from 300+ enterprise sources
author: CData Software

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Basic auth with Connect Cloud email and PAT (format: Basic email:pat)

CDATA_PAT.description: CData Connect Cloud Personal Access Token for authentication

CDATA_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for CData Connect Cloud API (default: https://cloud.cdata.com)

CDATA_DATASOURCE.description: Name of the CData Connect Cloud datasource to query

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level (error, warn, info, debug). Default: info
